p.k: Glykaris vanishes into the blizzard...
p.v: 格莱卡瑞斯消失在了暴风雪之中……

p.k: Void metal will now generate in new distortion chunks!

p.v: §4§l你为拯救沉睡之兆所获得的奖励。(拥有特殊攻击效果，

p.k: inflicts weakness and can kill unkilliable entitys such as the one who watches.)
p.v: 附加虚弱2效果，并且能够攻击到无法被攻击的实体，例如“注视者”）

p.k: §4I'M A GUY!
p.v: §4老子是男的！

p.k: §4I'M NOT A WOMAN!
p.v: §4老子不是女人！

p.k: §4SHUT THE HELL UP I AM NOT!
p.v: §4闭嘴！我不是！

p.k: §4I'M GOING TO RIP OUT YOUR SPINE AND KEEP IT AS A TROPHY!
p.v: §4老子要把你的脊椎扯出来当战利品！

p.k: §4N O .
§4Death aproaches...
p.v: §4死亡正在逼近……

p.k: §4YOU'LL REGRET CALLING ME THAT!
p.v: §4你那样称呼我会后悔的！

p.k: §4YOUR GOING TO DETROIT!
p.v: §4你将前往底特律！

p.k: §4IM GOING TO KILL YOU. AND THEN KILL YOU AGAIN.
p.v: §4老子要杀了你，然后再杀你一次！

p.k: §k§eTHIS WORLD DOES NOT BELONG TO YOU
p.v: §k§e这个世界不属于你

p.k: §eYOU CHEATED
p.v: §e你作弊了

p.k: §eYOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE YOU SHOULDNT BE HERE
p.v: §e你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！你不应该在这里！

p.k: §bThe air is freezing your skin.
p.v: §b空气正在冻伤你的皮肤。

p.k: Frozen creatures have begun migrating!
p.v: 冰霜生物已经开始迁徙过来！

p.k: §4Greetings.
p.v: §4你好。

p.k: §4You look shocked. Not expecting a scout to speak perhaps?
p.v: §4你看起来很震惊。或许没想到一个侦察兵会说话吧？

p.k: §4As am i. No human has ventured here for thousands of years.
p.v: §4我也是（感到惊讶）。数千年来都没有人类涉足过这里。

p.k: §4I am fascinated with your kind. I would like to learn more about your ways, why you do the things you do.
p.v: §4我对你们人类很感兴趣。我想更多地了解你们的行事方式，以及你们为何要那样做。

p.k: §4The rest of this worlds... simple minded... Specimens seem to be more concerned with consuming the fruit growing from the local flora than any form of higher knowledge.
p.v: §4安息之地世界上的其他……头脑简单的……家伙似乎更关心食用当地植物上结出的果实，而不是追求任何更高层次的知识。

p.k: §4Perhaps if you brought me some samples from around the world, I could offer you something in return.
p.v: §4也许如果你能从世界各地给我带些样本过来，我可以给你一些回报。

p.k: §4I will be here whenever you need to speak human. Good luck on your travels.
p.v: §4无论何时你想和我说话，我都会在这里，人类。祝你旅途顺利。

p.k: §4Greetings human.
p.v: §4你好。

p.k: §4The local scout population is out of control. They have become feral due to some strange presence.
p.v: §4当地的侦察兵数量已经失控了。由于某种奇怪的因素影响，它们变得狂野不羁。

p.k: §4You are in prime shape human. Its good to see your staying safe.
p.v: §4你状态极佳啊，人类。看到你平安无事真是太好了。

p.k: §4You appear to be damaged human. The local scout population can be overwhelming i know...
p.v: §4你看起来受伤了，人类。我知道当地的侦察兵数量众多，可能会让人难以招架……

p.k: §4I was once as mindless as the rest of these oculus... But as i grew older over thousands of years, i found pleasure in taking in knowledge from old books and ruined tablets around the resting grounds.
p.v: §4我曾经也和这些侦察兵一样头脑简单……但随着数千年的时光流逝，我在安息之地从古老的书籍和残破的石板上汲取知识的过程中，发现了其中的乐趣。

p.k: §4I've heard wonderous things of the overworld. I wonder human, is it true?
p.v: §4我听闻了许多关于上层世界的奇妙之事。人类，我想知道，那些都是真的吗？

p.k: §4hello human. how are you?
p.v: §4你好，人类。你怎么样？

p.k: §4Greetings... Excuse me. I was in thought.
p.v: §4你好……不好意思。我刚才在思考。

p.k: §4Do you have any data on the followers? They arnt very willing to share information with me.
p.v: §4你有关于那些追随者的资料吗？他们不太愿意和我分享消息。

p.k: §4Did you know scouts can only eat through the spike on their body by liquidating food... Large scout queens instead eat through their hollow legs...
p.v: §4你知道吗，侦察兵只能通过身体上的尖刺液化食物来进食……而大型侦察兵女王则是通过它们中空的腿来进食……

p.k: §4I've heard many a legend from your world. The man who comes from the fog. The one who watches from afar. The one who lurks in the caves and the one whos eyes glow like the moon... Tell me human. Are these legends true?
p.v: §4我从你们的世界听闻了许多传说。那个从迷雾中走来的人。那个在远处观望的人。那个在洞穴中潜伏的人，还有那个眼睛像月亮一样发光的人……告诉我，人类。这些传说都是真的吗？

p.k: §4You've come back human. I am glad to see you.
p.v: §4你回来了，人类。见到你我很高兴。

p.k: §4Hello again human.
p.v: §4再次向你问好，人类。

p.k: §4I apologize for the other scouts in this world. They are of... lower intelligence.
p.v: §4我为这个世界里的其他侦察兵向你道歉。他们的智力水平比较低……

p.k: §4Ive seen many things over the thousands of years ive wandered. I hope some of it may be of use to you.
p.v: §4在我这数千年的游历中，我见过许多事物。我希望其中一些能对你有所帮助。

p.k: §4Thank you for giving me a chance human. Most simply run away.
p.v: §4谢谢你给我这个机会，人类。大多数人都会直接跑开。

p.k: §4The followers came here so recently... yet they have constructed so much, even tamed a few scout queens. I must say, quite impressive.
p.v: §4追随者们来到这里的时间如此之短……然而他们已经建造了许多东西，甚至还驯服了几只侦察者女王。不得不说，相当了不起。

p.k: How come you just come back when you die. Thats just unfair.
p.v: 你怎么一死了就又能回来了。这太不公平了。

p.k: §4Hello.
p.v: §4你好。

p.k: §4I require 15 corranite ingots in order to continue my research... Please bring some to me and i will reward you...
p.v: §4我需要15个科兰合金锭才能继续我的研究……请给我带一些来，我会给你报酬……

p.k: §4Human. I would like to learn more about these... Void disciple specimens. I require 5 samples of them in order to conduct my research... I will reward you if you do this for me.
p.v: §4人类。我想更多地了解这些……虚空信徒样本。我需要5个它们的样本才能开展我的研究……如果你能为我做到这一点，我会给你报酬的。

p.k: §4Human. I would like to learn more about the tainted... Please bring me 10 samples of them and I will reward you...
p.v: §4人类。我想更多地了解被污染的生物。请给我带来10个它们的样本，我会给你报酬……

p.k: §4I would like to study the radi'ite ore of the void... Please bring me 25 samples of this mineral so i may continue my research.
p.v: §4我想研究虚空中的拉迪石……请给我带来25份这种矿石样本，这样我就能继续我的研究了。

p.k: §4Thank you for your assistance human... Please accept this as a reward.
p.v: §4感谢你的帮助，人类……请收下这个作为报酬。

p.k: §4This is not enough human... I apologize...
p.v: §4这不太够，人类……很抱歉……

p.k: §4This is not the right item human... I apologize for the confusion...
p.v: §4这不是正确的物品，人类……很抱歉造成了混淆……

p.k: §4Thank you for your assistance human... Please accept this as a reward.
p.v: §4感谢你的帮助，人类……请接受这个作为报酬。

p.k: §4Thats the wrong item human i apologize for not telling you... I will accept any corranite ingots you may want to part ways with.
p.v: §4那是错误的物品，人类，很抱歉之前没跟你说清楚……我愿意接受你给出的任何科兰合金锭。

p.k: §4Heart cores are living hearts which have formed in this ecosystem. the pump blood into the nearby flora. The drumming of this heartbeat also seems to put scouts in a frenzy... temporarily empowering them.
p.v: §4心脏核心是这个生态系统中形成的活生生的心脏。它们为附近的植物输送血液。这种心跳的鼓动似乎还会让侦察兵陷入狂热……暂时赋予它们力量。

p.k: §4Ah yes... The higher followers... These followers appear in two varients. The chosen... a follower who has been chosen by whom they worship, they have dropped their mask and sprouted a pair of hairs from their heads. And the condemned... A follower who tried to ascend but was rejected by its god and had its body mauled and mind shattered. Leaving it as a mindless killing machine.
p.v: §4啊，没错……那些高级追随者……这些追随者有两种类型。“被选中的追随者”——被他们所崇拜的对象选中的追随者，他们摘下了面具，头上长出了一对毛发。“被诅咒的追随者”——试图飞升但被他们的神拒绝的追随者，他们的身体被撕裂，心智被击碎，沦为了一个没有理智的杀戮机器 。

p.k: §4Corranite is the crystalized blood of organizms long past. It has fossilized due to the strange energy in this place and has become a tough yet flexible metal.
p.v: §4科兰合金是一种早已消逝的生物的结晶化血液。由于此地奇异的能量，它已经石化，变成了一种坚硬却又柔韧的金属。

p.k: §4Queens are extremely old scouts, hundreds of years old, which are responsible for laying the scout eggs found around the resting grounds, they are responsible for maintaining the scout population and will put up quite a fight if you enter their nests...
p.v: §4女王是非常年迈的侦察兵，已有数百年寿命。它们负责产卵，这些卵会在休息场所周围被发现。它们肩负着维持侦察兵种群数量的责任，要是你闯入它们的巢穴，它们会拼死一战……

p.k: §4The rot... An infection the oculus have feared for as long as the resting grounds has existed... The rot is a portion of the resting grounds that has died and begun to decay. It rots anything it makes contact with and the creatures who spawn there attempt to devour anything they see.
p.v: §4腐化……自安息之地存在以来，种族就一直惧怕的感染现象……腐化区域是安息之地中已经死亡并开始腐烂的部分。它会腐蚀任何与之接触的东西，而在那里滋生的生物会试图吞噬它们看到的一切。

p.k: Your gonna need 1 radiite block for that.
p.v: 你需要一块拉迪石块才可以交易。

p.k: A decorated scout horn. from australia. (Ezure youtuber item.)
p.v: 一个经过装饰的侦察号角。来自澳大利亚。（尤兹（Ezure）YouTube博主相关物品 。）

p.k: Hello There!
p.v: 你好呀！

p.k: Hey I actually do have something I need to talk to you about something
p.v: 嘿，我确实有件事要和你谈谈

p.k: Ever since that Daraku guy showed up my head has felt a bit foggy
p.v: 自从那个叫达拉库的byd(无)家伙出现后，我就感觉脑袋有点迷糊

p.k: Besides the fact that hes been terrorizing the overworld hes also been ruining my sense of direction.
p.v: 他除了一直在主世界肆虐之外，他还破坏了我的方向感。

p.k: If you could find some way to get rid of him or atleast nullify him that would be a great help.
p.v: 如果你能想办法除掉他，或者至少让他失去作用，那可就帮了大忙了。

p.k: Of course you would probably need another soul gem to do that.
p.v: 当然，你可能还需要另一颗灵魂宝石才能做到这一点。

p.k: Good luck out there
p.v: 祝你好运！

p.k: That daraku guy needs to be taken care of I suggest crafting something else from his soul gem to stop him because I dont think a sigil of purity would work on him.
p.v: 达尔库这家伙得好好收拾一番。我提议用他的灵魂宝石再炼制一件别的物件来对付他，毕竟我觉得净化徽章对他怕是不顶用。

p.k: Hey there!
p.v: 嘿！你好呀！

p.k: I'm guessing you took care of daraku, my head feels a lot clearer now.
p.v: 我猜你搞定达尔库那厮了吧，现在我脑袋清醒多啦~

p.k: Thank you for that, I really cant thank you enough for everything you've done.
p.v: 太感谢你了，你所做的一切我真是感激不尽。

p.k: I know im asking a lot of you. But I do have another request if thats ok with you.
p.v: 我知道我提了很多要求。不过如果可以的话，我还有另一个请求。

p.k: Now that my heads clear im remembering some things from my time as a monster I couldnt remember before.
p.v: 现在脑子清醒了，我回想起了一些以前身为怪物时想不起来的事。

p.k: I remember walking through a snow biome late at night and I felt a familiar presence.
p.v: 我记得深夜穿行在雪地生物群系时，感受到了一股熟悉的气息。

p.k: I saw a large creature I've never seen before deep in the blizzard.
p.v: 我在暴风雪深处看到了一只从未见过的巨大生物。

p.k: Though... it felt, strangely familiar?
p.v: 不过……它给人的感觉，莫名有些熟悉？

p.k: It's been bothering me for a while now, so I would really appreciate it if you went and checked out the nearby snow biomes for that thing.
p.v: 这事儿已经让我纠结一阵子了，所以要是你能去附近的雪地生物群系查看下那个神秘生物，我将感激不尽。

p.k: Im sorry if im asking too much.
p.v: 实在不好意思，我感觉自己提的这些要求或许有些过分啦(帮帮我嘛求求了呜呜呜~)。

p.k: Good luck out there! and thank you.
p.v: 祝你好运！还有……谢谢你！

p.k: If you want to find that creature I suggest searching snowy biomes.
p.v: 若你想找到那种生物，我建议你前往雪地群系探寻一番。

p.k: Hey! Have you dealt with that creature yet?
p.v: 嘿！你处理好那只生物了没？

p.k: Oh. It retreated you say?
p.v: 哦？你说它溜了？

p.k: Hmm. I think I know where it might have gone
p.v: 嗯……我觉着我知道它可能跑哪儿去了。

p.k: Theres this old wretched place I used to go when I was a monster
p.v: 有个地方，以前我身为怪物的时候老爱去，那地方又破败又阴森。

p.k: It was called the resting grounds.
p.v: 那地方叫安息之地。

p.k: All the scouts come from that realm. And I've seen many entities go there to heal their wounds. Including this Glykaris fellow.
p.v: 所有侦察兵都来自那个领域。我还见过不少生灵去那里疗伤，其中就有这个叫格莱卡瑞斯的家伙。

p.k: If you really want to go there I can send you there. You will need to find a ire shrine in order to exit and Its extremely risky.
p.v: 要是你真想去那儿，我能把你送过去。不过你得先找到一个怒火神殿才能离开，而且那地方危险得很。

p.k: If you choose to go there i do wish you luck...
p.v: 要是你决定去那儿，那我真心祝你好运……

p.k: Hey! im guessing you dealt with glykaris?
p.v: 嘿！我猜你已经处理了格莱卡瑞斯了吧？

p.k: Well by now im sure your not suprised to hear that killing it wont keep it down forever.
p.v: 嗯，现在我敢肯定，听到“杀了它并不能永远解决它”这个消息，你不会感到惊讶了。

p.k: But there may be a way to fix this.
p.v: 不过，或许有办法解决这个问题。

p.k: Perhaps that monster isnt what it seems. maybe it could be cured! just like me.
p.v: 也许那只怪物并非表面看上去的那样。说不定它也能被治愈呢！就像我一样。

p.k: Maybe if you crafted some kind of soul capsule you could cure him and transport him out of the resting grounds.
p.v: 也许你可以制作某种灵魂罐，这样既能净化它，还能把它送出安息之地。

p.k: Though im sure it would be difficult to obtain.
p.v: 不过我肯定，要获取（制作灵魂罐所需的材料）会很难。

p.k: But I think its worth it so bring peace to another lost soul!
p.v: 但我觉得这值得一试，这样就能给另一个迷失的灵魂带来安宁了！

p.k: Good luck out there!
p.v: 祝你好运！

p.k: Glykaris may be weak enough to be cured now! I wonder who that viscious beast truly is.
p.v: 格莱卡瑞斯现在可能虚弱到能被净化了！真好奇那只凶狠的野兽究竟是什么来头。

p.k: Im guessing you've captured glykaris now?
p.v: 我猜你现在已经抓住了格莱卡瑞斯了吧？

p.k: Great! I never doubted you for a moment.
p.v: 太棒了，我就相信你一定可以的OvO！

p.k: Thank you for saving my brother I cant thank you enough.

p.k: Uuuh.
Well, hmm. Bring me one block of origin matter I guess.

p.k: Come talk to me again if your interested.

p.k: Hey.
p.v: 嘿。

p.k: Well you've come back so i guess you want that quest.
p.v: 嗯，你回来了，所以我猜你是想要做那个任务。

p.k: I've never told you but when I was still empowered I was in a little battle of my own. Just like you and tiso.
p.v: 我之前从未跟你讲过，但当我还拥有力量的时候，我也经历过一场属于自己的小战斗。就像你和提索那样。

p.k: Deep beneath the bedrock of the distortion. Something has been trying crawl its way out from the depths.
p.v: 在虚空世界的基岩深处。有什么东西一直试图从深处爬出来。

p.k: This creature is ancient. Its lived since the birth of the distortion it very well could be billions of years old
p.v: 这个生物非常古老。它自虚空世界诞生之初就存在了，很可能已经有数十亿年的历史了。

p.k: My disciples and I have been keeping that thing down there for years. And without me, im afraid it might escape.
p.v: 我和我的信徒们多年来一直将那东西压制在下面。而且没有我，恐怕它会逃脱。

p.k: Its a pretty tough ask. But if you've got the guts to go down there and defeat it, that could weaken it enough to keep it bound.
p.v: 这可是个相当艰巨的任务。但如果你有胆量下去打败它，或许能削弱它的力量，让它继续被束缚住。

p.k: Oh yeah. And dont try any of your friendship nonsense with this creature it was never human it does not feel, it only wishes to hunt any living thing it sees.
p.v: 哦，对了。别跟这生物来你那些虚情假意的套近乎把戏。它从来都不是人类，没有情感，只想着猎杀它看到的任何生灵。

p.k: If you choose to do this. Take this to break through the bedrock twice at the bottom of the distortion. Also, good luck, your gonna need it.
p.v: 如果你决定接受这个任务。带上这个，它能在虚空世界底部的基岩层凿穿两次。还有，祝你好运，你肯定用得着。还有……你一定要回来啊……

p.k: Oh and if you need another one of those It'll cost you another origin matter block hehehe
p.v: 哦，如果你还需要一个，那就得再拿一块起源物质块来换，嘿嘿嘿

p.k: If your up to the task go down to bedrock and break it open. attempting to break it a second time should let you access the abyss.
p.v: 如果你准备好接受这个任务，就下到基岩层，把它击碎。尝试第二次击碎它时，你应该就能进入深渊了。

p.k: What.
p.v: 什么？

p.k: Wait you actually fended it off?
p.v: 啊？你居然真的把它击退了？

p.k: What do you mean you killed it?!
p.v: 你说你把它干掉了？什么意思？

p.k: Wow. you never cease to amaze me kid.
p.v: 哇哦。孩子，你是这个（点赞），你总是让我惊叹不已。

p.k: To be honest I assumed that thing was immortal.
p.v: 说实话，我以为那byd东西是不死之身呢。

p.k: Well I gotta say kid, you got a lot going for you. I would say you've proved yourself.
p.v: 嗯，我得说，孩子，你身上有很多闪光点。我还得说，你已经证明了自己的能力。

p.k: From now on that thing shouldnt bother you in the abyss. so feel free to explore it to your hearts content.
p.v: 从现在起，那东西应该不会再在深渊里打扰你了。所以你可以随心所欲地去探索它啦。

p.k: Oh yeah I suppose I should give you your reward.
p.v: 对了，我想我应该得奖励你了。

p.k: I made this myself take good care of it
p.v: 这是我亲手做的，好好保管它。

p.k: Welp. other than that I dont have anything for you to do now. Stay safe out there bud.
p.v: 除此之外，我现在没什么任务给你了。伙计，外面注意安全。

p.k: What the hell.
p.v: 我的发，搞什么鬼。

p.k: Alright I'll stay around here.
p.v: 好嘟，我就待在这儿

p.k: Alright I'll move again
p.v: 好嘟，那我又要动起来了

p.k: Distorted creatures are no longer invading the Overworld!
p.v: 扭曲生物不再入侵主世界了！

p.k: Tiso would like to talk to you.
p.v: 提索有事想和你谈谈。

p.k: Objective complete! Return to glykaris.
p.v: 任务完成！回到格莱卡瑞斯那儿领取奖励吧。

p.k: §l§4What?
p.v: §l§4什么？

p.k: §l§4What is this?
p.v: §l§4这是什么？

p.k: §l§4Who are these people. they look so. familiar...
p.v: §l§4这些人是……他们看起来好……熟悉……

p.k: §l§4How could I have forgotten.
p.v: §l§4我怎么会忘了呢……

p.k: §l§4My worst mistake.
p.v: §l§4这是我最严重的错误……

p.k: §l§4I lost control and pushed the people closest to me away...
p.v: §l§4我失去了理智，把最亲近的人都推开了……

p.k: §l§4I never even got to apologize for how I acted.
p.v: §l§4我甚至都没机会为我当时的行为道歉……

p.k: §l§4Now all my siblings will remember of me is the grief I caused them.
p.v: §l§4现在我的兄弟姐妹们记住的，只有我给他们带来的伤痛……

p.k: §l§4Our parents death took a toll on all of us. I shouldnt have been so selfish.
p.v: §l§4父母的离世对我们所有人都造成了沉重打击。我不该那么自私的……

p.k: §l§4I suppose in a way. I took it out on you too human.
p.v: §l§4我想，在某种程度上，我也把气撒在了你身上，人类……

p.k: §l§4I... apologize for that. and any trouble I caused you.
p.v: §l§4我……为那件事，还有我给你带来的所有麻烦道歉……

p.k: §l§4And thank you. For bringing me to my senses.
p.v: §l§4还有，谢谢你让我清醒过来……

p.k: §l§4I know it isnt much. but please take this as a token of my gratitude.
p.v: §l§4我知道这不算什么。但请收下这个，就当是我感激之情的一点心意。

p.k: Distorted Creatures Are Invading The Overworld!
p.v: 扭曲生物正在入侵主世界！（虚空世界的怪开始在主世界生成）

p.k: §4§lThe Slumbering Omen: OH YOU WANNA FIGHT HUH?!
p.v: §4§l沉睡之兆：嚯，你想打架是吧？！

p.k: Where do you want to go?
p.v: 你想去哪里呀？

p.k: Ok I'll stop following you
p.v: 好哒，我不跟着你了

p.k: What? Why are you giving me this? I dont understand you human.
p.v: 什么？你为什么要给我这个？我真不明白你，人类。

p.k: I dont want your pitty.
p.v: 我不需要你的怜悯。ヽ(ー_ー )ノ

p.k: Glykaris has retreated!
p.v: 格莱卡瑞斯已经撤退了！

p.k: Tiso would like to talk to you...
p.v: 提索有事想和你谈谈...

p.k: Tiso would like to talk to you.
p.v: 提索有事想和你谈谈。

p.k: Tiso would like to talk to you!
p.v: 提索有事想和你谈谈！

p.k: Tiso would like to talk to you.
p.v: 提索有事想和你谈谈。

p.k: where are we going?
p.v: 我们要去哪儿？

p.k: ok,
p.v: 好的喵~，

p.k: You want to test your strength huh? go and kill 20 distortion monsters and return to me.
p.v: 你想试试自己的实力吗？去杀掉20只扭曲怪物，然后回来见我。

p.k: You want to test your strength huh? go and kill 20 zombies and return to me.
p.v: 你想试试自己的实力吗？去杀掉20个僵尸，然后回来见我。

p.k: You want to test your strength huh? go and kill 15 skeletons and return to me.
p.v: 你想试试自己的实力吗？去杀掉15个骷髅，然后回来见我。

p.k: You want to test your strength huh? go and kill 15 spiders and return to me.
p.v: 你想试试自己的实力吗？去杀掉15只蜘蛛，然后回来见我。

p.k: You want to test your strength huh? go and kill 10 creepers and return to me.
p.v: 你想试试自己的实力吗？去杀掉10个苦力怕，然后回来见我。

p.k: Nice job out there. heres your reward.
p.v: 干得漂亮，这是给你的奖励喵~

p.k: I'll stay here.
p.v: 我会留在这的喵~

p.k: I'll move around.
p.v: 我会四处走动喵~

p.k: §4Not So Fast...
p.v: §4还没到时间呢……

p.v: §4迷失者无法再生成

p.v: §4迷失者现在可以生成

p.v: §4监督者无法再生成

p.v: §4监督者现在可以生成

p.k: Oh- Really?! Right infront of me?!
p.v: 哦—— 真的吗？！就在我面前？！

p.k: ???:You're pretty heartless arnt you?
p.v: ？？？：你可真没心没肺啊，不是吗？

p.k: §dThe Scoutlet seems calm at the moment...
p.v: §d侦察兵此刻似乎很平静……

p.k: §4The Scoutlet seems alarmed about something...
p.v: §4侦察兵似乎对某事感到惊慌……

p.k: Hello? Is someone there?
p.v: 你好？有人在那里吗？

p.k: I thought I was the only one out here.
p.v: 我还以为这里只有我一个人呢。

p.k: Come outside.
p.v: 到外面来，我是史蒂夫，你可以通过小地图找到我。

p.k: Dont worry Im friendly.
p.v: 别担心，我很友好的。

p.k: Hello? I need help.
p.v: 你好？我需要帮助

p.k: I have supplies, follow me!
p.v: 我有好多装备，跟我来！我是史蒂夫，你可以通过小地图找到我。

p.k: We should stick together its a harsh world out there.
p.v: 我们应该团结在一起，外面的世界很残酷的。

p.k: Please help me...
p.v: 请帮帮我……我是史蒂夫，你可以……

p.k: Ok I'll stay here
p.v: 好哒，我留在这儿。

p.k: Ok I'll move around again.
p.v: 好哒，我又要四处走动啦。

p.k: §4Tainted Distant Ones can no longer spawn.
p.v: §4被污染的远方者不再生成。

p.k: §4Tainted Distant Ones can now spawn.
p.v: §4被污染的远方者现在可以生成。

p.k: Heya
p.v: 你好啊

p.k: I dont get why your all nice to me suddenly.
p.v: 我就不明白了，你怎么突然都对我这么好了，你该不会是想……

p.k: Well you dont look like your about to die so thats good.
p.v: 嗯，你看起来不像快要死了，这就很好。

p.k: Jesus did someone throw a block of tnt at you?
p.v: 天呐，有人朝你扔了个TNT炸药块吗？

p.k: The overworld is nice. I suppose destroying it would be a shame.
p.v: 主世界很不错。我想把它毁了会很可惜吧。

p.k: How are you?
p.v: 你怎么样？

p.k: I hope your doing alright. Thats something i never expected to say.
p.v: 我希望你过得还好。这是我从未想过自己会说出口的话。

p.k: Its pretty nice out today.
p.v: 今天外面天气挺不错的。

p.k: You visited the distortion since the whole unpowering incident? It feels a bit off.
p.v: 你去过我失去力量之后的扭曲之地吗？感觉有点不对劲。

p.k: I hope my disciples are holding up well without me.
p.v: 希望我的信徒们在我不在的时候一切都好。

p.k: Distortis has come after me a few times now that im not as strong as him. I suppose he only served be because I would've killed him otherwise.
p.v: 自从我没他那么强大之后，扭曲追踪者已经来找过我几次了。我猜他当初为我效力，只是因为怕我会杀了他。

p.k: Even now im still a void entity. I wonder what it was like to be human.
p.v: 即便到现在我也仍是一个虚空实体。真好奇当人类是什么样的感觉。

p.k: I find this world quite fascinating.
p.v: 我觉得这个世界相当迷人。

p.k: I find myself more and more tired every day.
p.v: 我发现自己每天都越来越累了。

p.k: Your alright.
p.v: 你没事的。

p.k: Huh? Sorry I dozed off.
p.v: 啊？抱歉，我打了个盹儿。

p.k: You ok?
p.v: 你还好吧？

p.k: Hey there.
p.v: 嘿，你好呀。

p.k: hm?
p.v: 嗯？

p.k: What do YOU want.
p.v: 你想要什么？

p.k: I dont want to talk to you.
p.v: 我不想和你这个人讲话。

p.k: You look healthy. just been running from all your battles huh?
p.v: 你看起来状态不错，是不是一直在到处躲避你那些战斗啊？

p.k: You look pretty beat up. Good I hope it hurts.
p.v: 你看起来伤得不轻。很好，我希望这很痛。

p.k: I was this close to taking over the overworld and you just had to play hero.
p.v: 我差一点就统治主世界了，结果你非要来当英雄搅局。

p.k: Please by all means, leave me alone.
p.v: 拜托，无论如何都别来烦我。

p.k: I was having a good day until you came around.
p.v: 在你出现之前，我本来过得很愉快。

p.k: I used to be able to claw through bedrock. Now I cant even break cobblestone because of you.
p.v: 以前我能手撸基岩，就是因为你，现在连圆石我都砸不动了。

p.k: Go away.
p.v: 走开。

p.k: That Tiso guy seems pretty happy. Lucky him.
p.v: 那个叫提索的家伙看起来很开心，真幸运啊他。

p.k: Stop talking to me.
p.v: 别跟我说话了。

p.k: Come to mock a defeated foe? dont bother.
p.v: 是来嘲笑一个战败的对手吗？别费劲了。

p.k: You know how hard I worked to get that strong? There arnt even enough void entities left that I can consume to get that strong again.
p.v: 你知道我为了变得那么强大付出了多少努力吗？现在甚至都没有足够的虚空实体供我吞噬，让我恢复到以前的强度了。

p.k: I hope you dig down into lava.
p.v: 我希望你掉进岩浆里。

p.k: Im sick of seeing your face.
p.v: 我不想再看到你这张让人厌烦的脸了

p.k: Please. Just leave.
p.v: 求求你了，走开吧

p.k: If I have to see your face again I'm jumping into lava
p.v: 要是我再看到你这张让人厌烦的脸，我就跳进岩浆里。

p.k: How come you just come back when you die. Thats just unfair.
p.v: 你怎么每次死了都能回来啊，这太不公平了。

p.k: hmm?
p.v: 嗯？

p.k: oh. hello.
p.v: 哦，你好喵~

p.k: you look healthy.
p.v: 你看起来状态很不错喵~

p.k: we all get battle scars. its just part of being an adventurer
p.v: 我们都会留下战斗伤疤，这只是身为冒险者的一部分罢了喵~

p.k: thanks for the help earlier.
p.v: 感谢你之前的帮助喵~

p.k: whats up?
p.v: 怎么啦喵~

p.k: I was always an expert at slaying monsters. I never expected to become one.
p.v: 我一直是消灭怪物的专家，从没想过自己有一天也会变成怪物喵~

p.k: Thanks for helping out my brother tiso. He can get too emotional sometimes.
p.v: 谢谢你帮我弟弟提索。他有时就是太感性了喵~

p.k: You must be pretty strong if you took out all these eldritch entities huh?
p.v: 要是能消灭所有这些神秘实体，肯定相当厉害吧喵~

p.k: Im tired.
p.v: 我累了喵~

p.k: I love the snow I've always found it calming.
p.v: 我喜欢雪，我一直觉得雪让人感到平静喵~

p.k: I hope tiso's doing alright without his sister. He always seemed so attached to her.
p.v: 我希望提索在没有姐姐的日子里一切都好。他看起来一直都很黏她呢喵~

p.k: To think our whole family was damned to this fate. it cant be a coincidence right?
p.v: 想到我们全家都被注定要遭受这样的命运。这不可能只是巧合，对吧喵~

p.k: who's that frail little lizard whos been scampering around? i dont recognize him from anywhere.
p.v: 那个虚弱的小蜥蜴是谁啊？它到处乱窜，我可从没见过它喵~

p.k: I wonder what happened to everyone else.
p.v: 我在想其他人怎么样了喵~

p.k: Its a nice day today.
p.v: 今天天气不错喵~

p.k: huh?
p.v: 啊？

p.k: Hey.
p.v: 嘿。

p.k: What are you up to today?
p.v: 你今天有什么安排喵~

p.k: Hi there!
p.v: 你好呀！

p.k: How are you?
p.v: 你还好吗？

p.k: You dont look too beat up today, thats good!
p.v: 你今天看起来没那么狼狈，挺好的！

p.k: oh dear. you might want to patch yourself up.
p.v: 哎呀，你或许该给自己处理一下伤口（心疼）。

p.k: Sorry about the whole rampaging thing before I wasnt myself.
p.v: 之前我失控大闹的事儿真不好意思，那时候我都不像我自己了。

p.k: Watcha up too?
p.v: 你在忙什么呢？

p.k: Hey! do you need something?
p.v: 嘿！你需要点什么吗？

p.k: I hope your having a nice day.
p.v: 希望你今天过得愉快。

p.k: hi friend!
p.v: 嘿，朋友！

p.k: I saw a tall pale figure staring at me the other night. do you know who that is?
p.v: 前几天晚上我看到一个高高的、脸色苍白的身影在盯着我看。你知道那是谁吗？

p.k: Do you have any more of those sweet berry things? I love them.
p.v: 你还有那些甜浆果吗？我超喜欢吃~

p.k: I love being myself again but I do kinda miss being able to fell trees with my bare hands.
p.v: 我很享受变回自己，但也挺怀念以前能徒手砍树的时光。

p.k: Things seem a bit calmer now. I guess I was causing a bit of a disruption wasnt I?
p.v: 现在情况似乎平静多了。我猜我之前有点捣乱了吧，是不是？

p.k: Try not to get mauled out there. the world needs you.
p.v: 在外面可别被野兽撕咬了。这世界需要你。

p.k: I feel a bit tired today.
p.v: 我今天感觉有点累。

p.k: You must be pretty skilled if you were able to get this far. good job!
p.v: 如果你能做到这一步，肯定相当厉害。干得好！

p.k: The clouds are pretty today.
p.v: 今天的云真美呀。

p.k: how come whenever you seem to perish you always show up again? Maybe im just delusional.
p.v: 为什么每次你好像都死了，却又总是会再次出现呢？也许我只是产生了幻觉。

p.k: Any plans today?
p.v: 今天有什么计划吗？

p.k: A strange chill goes down your spine...
p.v: 一阵莫名的寒意顺着你的脊梁骨蔓延开来……

p.k: §l§4Better luck next time dad.
p.v: §l§4祝你下次好运，爸爸。

p.k: §l§4Still testing the mod are we?
p.v: §l§4你还在测试这个模组吗？

p.k: §l§4Given who you are im guessing you weren't scared in the slightest?
p.v: §l§4考虑到你的身份，我猜你压根就没怎么害怕，是不是？

p.k: §l§4Oh its a wrap! But not for me.
p.v: §l§4哦，结束了！但对我来说还没结束。

p.k: §l§4You arnt going to show this death are you?
p.v: §l§4你不会把这个死亡展示出来吧？

p.k: §l§4Better luck next time Jamsteo...
p.v: §l§4祝你下次好运，詹斯托……

p.k: §l§4You really put the moron in your name huh?
p.v: §l§4你真把“蠢货”二字诠释到你这名儿里去了，是吧？

p.k: §l§4Mmmm... Yummy hotdog...
p.v: §l§4嗯……好吃的热狗……

p.k: §l§4Are you really that afraid of me Ezure?
p.v: §l§4伊泽尔，你真的那么怕我吗？

p.k: §l§4I guess thats why they call you Joker huh?
p.v: §l§4我想这就是他们叫你小丑的原因吧，嗯？

p.k: §l§4Back to the void with you idiot.
p.v: §l§4带着你，滚回虚空去，白痴。

p.k: §l§4Try NOT to die next time Khyle...
p.v: §l§4下次可别死了，凯尔……

p.k: i am bei ming de yu dakun
p.v: 我是北北北北啊冥冥冥冥

p.k: bmdy i am
p.v: 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊

p.k: Summons a frost circle a distance from the player. Consumes 150 mana.
p.v: 从距离玩家一定处召唤一个冰霜法阵。消耗150点法力值。

p.k: Fires small Ireflame Bullets that can be aimed in any direction around yourself but not up or down
p.v: 发射小型炎弹，这些炎弹可朝你周围任意水平方向瞄准，但无法朝上或朝下瞄准 。

p.k: bolts have a chance to inflict ireflame. Consumes 40 mana.
p.v: 炎弹有几率造成炎灼效果。消耗40点法力值。

p.k: makes a small flame combustion a distance from the player. Consumes 40 mana.
p.v: 在距离玩家一定处引发小型火焰燃烧。消耗40点法力值。

p.k: Summons amethyst shards above where the player aims that explode upon contact with the ground. Consumes 80 mana.
p.v: 在玩家瞄准位置的上方召唤紫水晶碎片，这些碎片在接触地面时爆炸。消耗80点法力值。

p.k: Summons a blade that stays in place before launching towards your cursor. Consumes 80 mana.
p.v: 召唤一把刀刃，刀刃先停留在原地，随后朝你的光标位置发射出去。消耗80点法力值。

p.k: summons rows of iron spikes that seek the closest enemy and erupt on collision. Consumes 100 mana.
p.v: 召唤一排排铁刺，这些铁刺会追踪最近的敌人，并在碰撞时爆发。消耗100点法力值。

p.k: Fires a small fireball that fires towards the location of your cursor and explodes after a few seconds. Consumes 80 mana. "Its wizard time mf fireball!"
p.v: 发射一个小火球，该火球会朝你光标所在位置飞去，并在几秒后爆炸。消耗80点法力值。“是时候施展魔法啦，我勒个去，火球术！”

p.k: Summons 4 radiant pillars that linger diagonally around the player. Consumes 200 mana.
p.v: 召唤4根散发着光芒的柱子，这些柱子会以对角线形式环绕在玩家周围。消耗200点法力值。

p.k: casts a aura around the player that damages and poisons enemies. Consumes 120 mana.
p.v: 在玩家周围施放一个光环，该光环会对敌人造成伤害并使其中毒。消耗120点法力值。

p.k: Casts a beam under nearby enemies feet after a delay. Consumes 120 mana.
p.v: 在短暂延迟后，对附近敌人的脚下施放一道光束。消耗120点法力值。

p.k: fires 3 bolts that spread. Consumes 80 mana.
p.v: 发射3枚会散射的飞弹。消耗80点法力值。

p.k: Fires a burst of 3 flaming bolts. Consumes 40 mana.
p.v: 发射3枚会燃烧的飞弹。消耗40点法力值。

p.k: Fires a powerful sonic boom. Consumes 200 mana.
p.v: 发射一道强大的音爆波。消耗200点法力值。

p.k: Welcome to the slumbering omen! This is mod focused on adding new horror/fantasy themed content to the game. This book will provide some handy information and be used as a bestiary for the rest of the game, though you will need to find an inscription table to unlock the entries by researching items dropped by the creature you want to unlock.
p.v: 欢迎来到沉睡的预兆模组！这是一个专注于为游戏添加新的恐怖/奇幻主题内容的模组。这本书将提供一些实用信息，并在游戏的后续部分充当一本怪物图鉴。不过，你需要找到一个铭刻台，通过研究你想要解锁的怪物掉落的物品来解锁图鉴中的条目。

p.k: Unlocks beastiary entries by researching mob drops.
p.v: 通过研究怪物掉落的物品来解锁怪物图鉴条目。

p.k: The common scout. These include standard, distorted, aggressive and frozen scouts. Each function similar, all but the standard scout being extremely territorial swarming any human they come across. while the standard scout instead lives up to the name and reveals the players location to the omen. When killing a scout it will drop parts of its body that can be made into usefull items or be traded to the curious voidfolk in the distortion for some useful materials. scouts are also notoriously easy to trap and originate from the resting grounds.
p.v: 普通侦察兵。其中包括标准侦察兵、扭曲侦察兵、攻击性侦察兵和冰冻侦察兵。它们的功能相似，除了标准侦察兵外，其余的都极具领地意识，会蜂拥而上攻击它们遇到的任何人类。而标准侦察兵则名副其实，会将玩家的位置暴露给沉睡之兆。当杀死一名侦察兵时，它会掉落身体部件，这些部件可以制作成有用的物品，或者可以用来与虚空世界中好奇的虚空民交换一些有用的材料。侦察兵还极易设陷阱捕捉，并且它们来自安息之地。

p.k: Mangled mobs are regular creatures infected with the omens magic. Their bodies have been torn apart and reanimated into terrifying abominations who are much stronger than their uninfected counterparts, mangled mobs can also infect other mobs. Mangled mob parts are used for variety of armor and weapons and they are also highly praised by voidfolk.
p.v: 被畸形的怪物是被沉睡之兆的魔法感染的普通生物。它们的身体被撕裂后又被重新赋予生命，变成了比未被感染的同类强大得多的可怕怪物。被畸形的怪物还能感染其他生物。被畸形怪物的身体部位可用于制作各种盔甲和武器，并且它们也深受虚空民的高度赞赏。

p.k: Followers are humanoids who worship the slumbering omen and have infected themself with ire magic, Followers have different rankings the higher the rank the higher the authority of the follower. standard followers have 40 health, spearmasters have 60, entropic followers have 80 and elite followers have 120. There are also trader followers which specialize in trading for sunset jewels which are highly valued by followers. when killed spearmasters and entropic followers have a 1% chance to drop their weapon, while elite followers have a 5% chance. all followers also drop amsk fragments that can be used to craft a headpeice with very high defense with the tradeoff of not being able to use armor set bonuses. Followers are found in camps and other structures they have created, these structures have a large amount of loot.
p.v: 追随者们是一群崇拜沉睡之兆并且使自身感染上怒火魔法的人形生物。他们有着不同的等级划分，等级越高，所拥有的权限便越大。普通追随者拥有40点生命值，长矛大师为60点，熵追随者是80点，而精英追随者则有120点。此外，还有交易型追随者，他们专注于用怒火绿宝石进行交易，这种宝石在追随者群体中极受珍视。当长矛大师和熵追随者被击杀时，有1%的概率掉落他们的武器；精英追随者被击杀时，这一概率则为5%。所有追随者被击杀后都会掉落面具碎片，这些碎片可用于打造一顶防御力极高的头盔，不过缺点是无法享受盔甲套装的加成效果。追随者们分布在他们自行创建的营地及其他建筑中，这些建筑内藏有大量战利品。

p.k: Void Disciples are humans who have been infected with void via darakus influence. They serve daraku and have a chance to show up when the effect mark of the void expires. In combat they use their rapier-like arms to do strong teleport strikes that can quickly be overwhelming. When killed disciples drop voidcloth, radi'ite ectoplasm and disciple arms. these can be crafted into various weapons and the voidcloth armor set.
p.v: 虚空信徒是被达拉库影响而感染虚空力量的人类。他们效忠于达拉库，并且当虚空效果印记消失时，有一定几率现身。在战斗中，他们会用类似细剑的手臂发动强大的传送打击，这种攻击能迅速让对手难以招架。当虚空信徒被击杀时，他们会掉落虚空布碎片、拉迪石灵体以及信徒手臂。这些物品可用于制作各种武器以及虚空之布盔甲套装。

p.k: Paladins are scout party leaders that are capable of increasing the strength of nearby scouts and rogues. It is recommended to lure scouts away from paladins before fighting them as buffed scouts are highly dangerous. Paladin spines are also highly praised by voidfolk.
p.v: 圣骑士是侦察小队的队长，他们能够增强附近侦察兵和流氓的力量。建议在与其战斗前，先把侦察兵从圣骑士身边引开，因为受到增益效果的侦察兵极其危险。圣骑士的脊骨也深受虚空民的高度赞赏。

p.k: Rogues are a subspecies of scout who specialize in combat, being tankier fast and stronger than the standard scout, but fighting isnt their main job. The Rogues are infectors targetting any infectable mob to turn them into mangled mobs. Their drops can be traded to the curious voidfolk and they are much more praised by them and can be traded for better items.
p.v: 流氓是侦察兵的一个变种，擅长战斗。他们比普通侦察兵更耐打、速度更快且力量更强，但战斗并非他们的主要职责。流氓就如同它的名字一样，是感染体，会以任何可被感染的生物为目标，将它们变成畸形的怪物，很流氓。流氓掉落的物品可以与好奇的虚空民进行交易，而且这些物品深受虚空民的青睐，能用来换取更好的物品。

p.k: Voidcallers are small lizards that are known for following larger entities for protection and serve as extra pairs of eyes for creatures. Voidcallers are nearly impossible to kill without a ranged weapon but are easily sniped with a bow, this is required to harvest their scales. When a voidcaller gets too close it will scream and burrow away, alerting daraku of your position.
p.v: 虚空召唤者是小蜥蜴，以跟随较大型的生物寻求保护而闻名，同时充当这些生物的“额外眼睛”。若没有远程武器，几乎不可能杀死虚空召唤者，但用弓箭则很容易将其射杀，这也是获取它们鳞片的必要手段。当虚空召唤者靠得太近时，它会尖叫着钻入地下，从而向达拉库暴露你的位置。

p.k: Voyagers are large insectoid cryptids. Which despite their fearsome appearance are passive and even a source of food,
p.v: 航行者是体型巨大的昆虫类未确认生物。尽管它们外表狰狞，但实际上性情温和，甚至还能作为食物来源。

p.k: An unfortunate mass of fallen void disciples infected with a dangerous void shroom spore infection. it wanders the void searching for more flesh being able to screech at a frequency that poisons the listener. its teeth can be crafted into a distorted dagger.
p.v: 这是一团不幸的、感染了危险虚空蘑菇孢子感染的堕落虚空信徒残骸。它在虚空中游荡，寻找更多的血肉，还能发出一种频率的尖啸声，能使听到声音的人中毒。它的牙齿可以制作成一把扭曲匕首。

p.k: Nyctosis who has been infected with void. It will become agressive if looked at and drops black ice which is used for upgrading the ice sickle.
p.v: 扭曲的夜幕追踪者，它已被虚空侵蚀。如果有人注视它，它就会变得具有攻击性，并且会掉落黑冰，黑冰可用于升级冰镰刀。

p.k: Distortis is a void entity who serves as one of darakus warriors to avoid being consumed. Distortis is able to use screeches and spikes in combat. when killed it will drop hide and claws which are used in a few weapons.
p.v: 扭曲追踪者是一种虚空实体，为了避免被虚空吞噬，他成为了达拉库的战士之一。扭曲追踪者在战斗中能够利用尖啸声和尖刺进行攻击。当它被击杀时，会掉落兽皮和爪子，这些可用于制作一些武器。

p.k: The lost is a strange humanoid tainted entity attracted to this world by the energy of the many powerful entities inhabiting the world. The lost behaves strangely being friendly most of the time and aggressive the rest of the time, nobody really knows what goes in the losts head, it just seems to wander. When attacking the lost spends alot of energy being much faster for the first few seconds of chasing its prey to try and finish them off quickly, it will also use its sharp claws and tentacles to inflict bleeding. When killed the lost will drop many tainted items that can be used for armor and weapons, after being killed the lost wont actually die and instead retreat, after the first time it will also allow tainted distant ones and the overseer to spawn.
p.v: “迷失者”是一种奇怪的人形被污染的实体，因这个世界中众多强大存在的能量而被吸引到这个世界。迷失者行为怪异，大部分时间表现友好，其余时间则具有攻击性。没人真正知道迷失者在想什么，它似乎只是在四处游荡。攻击时，迷失者会耗费大量能量，在追逐猎物的最初几秒内速度会变得很快，试图迅速将其猎物击败。它还会用锋利的爪子和触须造成流血效果。当迷失者被杀死时，迷失者会掉落很多被污染的物品，这些物品可用于制作盔甲和武器。但迷失者被杀死后，迷失者实际上并不会死亡，而是会撤退。而且第一次被杀死后，被污染的远方者和监督将会出现。

p.k: Tainted distant ones are distant ones who have lost their way and become hateful of all life. they drop tainted materials used for weapons and armor.
p.v: 远方者是来自于未知世界的生物，只是迷失了方向才会出现在这里。被污染的远方者是那些迷失了方向、对所有生命都怀有仇恨的远方生物。它们会掉落用于制作武器和盔甲的被污染材料。

p.k: Daraku was a 18 year old boy who worked for a research facility who researched a variety of things, but daraku was most fascinated with the void, but he went too far and was consumed by it, its been 6 years since daraku was infected. Daraku appears in caves, the distortion and comes out when it rains. Daraku is able to do many things including perching on ceilings, going partially invisible and stealing players. Daraku in combat is able to grab their victim, when grabbed you need to click shift to escape but its only a chace to escape so you will need to mash it. when under 200 health daraku will try to teleport strike the player. daraku also gets stronger after the omen is defeated.
p.v: 达拉库曾是个18岁的少年，就职于一家从事各类研究的研究机构。达拉库对虚空特别着迷，不过他在这方面钻研得太过深入，最终被虚空吞噬。自达拉库被感染以来，已经过去六年了。达拉库会出现在洞穴以及虚空世界，而且一下雨就会现身。达拉库能力多样，能在天花板攀附、短暂隐身，甚至抓走玩家。在战斗中，达拉库可以抓住受害者。一旦被抓住，玩家需要按下Shift键尝试挣脱，但这只是有机会逃脱，所以得不断按键。当达拉库生命值低于200时，它会试图对玩家发动传送打击。此外，在击败沉睡之兆之后，达拉库会变得更强。

p.k: The Slumbering Omen is a large creature who used to be human before he died tragically and the hate in his heart from the events leading up to it morphed his soul into the abomination which slumbered undisturbed, until you showed up. The omen hunts for sport wanting only to get enjoyment out of toying with you he has countless different behaviors he cycles through to make sure you never know what he'll pull next. he is capable of harnessing ire magic using it for making attacks and to warp away. the omen will also help the player if hes feeling generous, by giving the player items for walking up to him, and being in passive moder where he will dance, crouch with the player and can be traded with using ominous berry treats both of which are required to get photo peices. take note in the omens pursuit behavior the one, that jumpscares you when it starts. you will need to rythemcally crouch and avoid jumping to escape as he will mimic your speed.
p.v: 沉睡之兆曾是一个人类，在经历了一场悲惨的死亡后，导致这场悲剧的事件所引发的怨恨，将他的灵魂扭曲成了这头恐怖的存在。此前，它一直沉睡，未曾被打扰，直到你的出现。   这个预兆以猎杀为乐，纯粹享受戏弄你的过程。它会循环展现出无数种不同的行为，让你永远猜不到它下一步会做什么。  它能够操控怒火魔法，利用这种魔法发起攻击，或是进行瞬移。  倘若预兆心情慷慨，它还会帮助玩家。当你走近它，且它处于被动模式时，它会给你物品。在这种模式下，它会跳舞、和玩家一起蹲下，还能用“不祥浆果点心”与你交易，这两样东西都是获取照片碎片的必需品。 需要注意的是，在预兆的追击行为中，有一种会在开始时触发惊吓效果（跳脸杀）。你需要有节奏地蹲下并避免跳跃来逃脱，因为它会模仿你的速度。

p.k: The Overseer is a large sentient mechanical organism whos only purpose is to annihilate any life it comes across. The overseer is capable of firing a medium range laser which does massive damage to any creature who is hit by it, the laser is telegraphed so if one steps out of the way of it they will be safe. It can also drop a nova bomb on its enemies that explodes after a few seconds dealing massive damage. when below 400 health the overseer becomes enrages losing the nova bomb and instead firing bursts of 4 lasers that can easily annihilate most lifeforms. When killed the overseer will drop materials for a chain blade, laser rifle and catalysts which banish certain tainted creatures fromt he world until they are allowed back.
p.v: 监督者是一种体型庞大、拥有感知能力的机械生物，其唯一目的就是消灭它遇到的任何生命。监督者能够发射中程激光，被激光击中的任何生物都会受到重创。这种激光会有明显的发射轨迹提示，所以只要及时躲开，就能确保安全。 它还能向敌人投放新星炸弹，炸弹会在数秒后爆炸，造成巨大伤害。当监督者的生命值降至400以下时，它会陷入狂怒状态，不再投放新星炸弹，转而发射一连串由4道激光组成的激光束，这足以轻易消灭大多数生物。 当监督者被击败后，它会掉落用于制作链刃、符文镭射步枪的材料，以及一些催化剂。这些催化剂能够将某些被污染的生物从这个世界驱逐出去，直至主动允许它们回归。

p.k: Weaker untrained versions of void discipes. They drop the same materials but have a hook on their arm due to their arms not being sharp enough to be used as weapons yet. These hooks are very useful for making energy manipulating items.
p.v: 虚空信徒中较为弱小且未经训练的存在。它们掉落的材料与普通虚空信徒相同，但由于手臂还不够锋利，无法用作武器，所以手臂上有一个钩子。这些钩子在制作操控能量的物品时非常有用。

p.k: Lanternlings are plant-like organisms who feed off the soil and are extremely aggressive towards anything that gets too close to it as they are unable to move. They get their name from their lantern-like appearance. they spend most of their time dormant and will wake up if attacked or if you get too close to it for too long. they will fire small boltts of energy at attackers but they are prone to missing.
p.v: 灯笼灵是类植物生物，以土壤为食。由于无法移动，任何靠得太近的东西都会让它们极具攻击性。它们的名字源于其灯笼般的外观。灯笼灵大部分时间处于休眠状态。若受到攻击，或者你长时间靠得太近，它们就会苏醒。它们会向攻击者发射小型能量弹，但容易打偏。

p.k: Voidmaggots are harmless and will try to avoid nearby creatures. They are the adolescent versions of lacerators and will evolve into them after a period of time being alive.
p.v: 虚空蛆虫无害，会尽量避开附近的生物。它们是撕裂者的幼体阶段，存活一段时间后会进化成撕裂者。

p.k: Lacerators are large antlion like creatures who are very adept at tracking down prey and their mandibles are serrated and capable of inflicting bleeding. Their jaws are used for various equiptment and their flesh is edible.
p.v: 撕裂者是一种体型巨大的蚁狮状生物，它们非常擅长追踪猎物。其上颚呈锯齿状，能够造成流血伤害。它们的下颚可用于制作各种装备，其肉还可食用。

p.k: Frostcrawlers are large insects who who disguise themselves as ice spikes sticking out of the ground and will emerge when the spike is damaged. their jaws and legs are used a few recipes.
p.v: 冰霜爬行者是一种大型昆虫，它们会伪装成从地面伸出的冰刺，当冰刺受到破坏时就会现身。它们的颚和腿可用于制作一些物品。（作者把冰霜爬行者的介绍和冰霜元素写成一样的了，所以大坤也没办法，不过都是冰霜的生物，大家可以自己想象一下）

p.k: Optic Stalkers are a relative of the scout who have evolved 4 long legs to traverse around the abyss roots and have taken on a more solitary lifestyle due to the competition for food in the abyss. The optic stalkers practice a strange movement pattern where they try to confuse the attacker by randomly stopping.
p.v: 视觉追踪者是侦察兵的近亲，它们进化出了四条长长的腿，以便在深渊根穿梭。由于深渊中食物竞争激烈，它们过上了更为独居的生活。视觉追踪者采用一种奇特的移动模式，通过随机停下脚步来迷惑攻击者。（作者把夹颚兽的介绍和视觉追踪者写成一样的了，所以大坤也没办法，不过都是来自于深渊的生物，大家可以自己想象一下）

p.k: Scamperers are fat little bugs related to tardigrades who are one of the few food sources in the abyss, they have learned to run from other creatures to avoid being eaten.
p.v: 潜行追踪者是一种体型肥胖的小虫子，与水熊虫有亲缘关系。它们是深渊中为数不多的食物来源之一，为了不被吃掉，已经学会从其他生物身边跑开。

p.k: Oculus are small leech-like worms who slither around the abyss avoiding other creatures. they are simply ambient wildlife.
p.v: 天眼是一种小型水蛭状蠕虫，它们在深渊中蜿蜒爬行，躲避其他生物。它们只是普通的野生生物罢了。

p.k: Gellius are a passive relative of the slime who have adapted to have legs for traversing the distortion. They are one of the few food souces in the distortion as their slimeballs are edible and can be turned into gellius pops. Their slime can also be turned into gellius slime blocks which allow you to run faster and jump higher on them making them great for paths.
p.v: 格利乌斯是一种性格温和的史莱姆近亲，为适应在虚空世界行动，已进化出腿。在虚空世界，它们是为数不多的食物来源之一，其史莱姆球可食用，还能加工成冰棍。此外，它们的黏液还能制成格利乌斯黏液块，站在上面能让角色的奔跑速度加快、跳跃高度提升，因此很适合作为道路铺设材料。

p.k: Glykaris is a large frozen giant. despite its appearance it is a feline and not a yeti. Glykaris is fight using its massive arms and can easily dispatch its target. Its also capable of ice magic creating waves of ice spikes under ice target and created a sigil of frost magic at its feet that inflict frostbite. Frostbite can be removed using fire or campfires. When killed glykaris's armor will break and it will retreat to the resting grounds. where it must be fought again to actually kill it. though with its armor broken it will have less defense but gain added strength and mobility, including a jumping slam attack.
p.v: 格莱卡瑞斯是一个巨大的冰霜巨人。尽管外表看上去像雪人，但实际上它是一头猫科生物。格莱卡瑞斯用它粗壮的手臂进行战斗，能轻松击败目标。它还能施展冰系魔法，在攻击冰属性目标时，会制造出一波波冰刺；并且在脚下生成一个冰霜魔法的符文印记，使敌人遭受冻伤。冻伤可以用火或者营火消除。当格莱卡瑞斯被击败时，它的护甲会破碎，然后它会撤退到安息之地。若想真正将其消灭，必须在那里再次与它战斗。不过，护甲破碎后，它的防御力虽有所降低，但力量和机动性都会增强，还新增了跳跃重摔攻击的技能。

p.k: The Vantablack Reaper is a massive dragon whos existed since the birth of the distortion it is billions upon billions of years old and has evolved into a perfect predator dominating the food chain so effectively that the rest of the ecosystem has gone into hiding. The reaper uses many attacks from exploding scales to lumenados and a variety of physical attacks its a force to be reckoned with. The reaper also gets stronger when below 1000 health. When killed the reapers materials are used for some high quality void armor and weapons. The vantablack weaper can be refought by using a heart of the ancients on a lumen altar.
p.v: “漆黑收割者”是一条体型巨大的巨龙，自虚空世界诞生之初就已存在，它已有数十亿年的历史，进化成了一种完美的掠食者，如此有效地称霸食物链，以至于生态系统中的其他生物都只能躲藏起来。收割者拥有多种攻击手段，从会爆炸的鳞片到“流明秘术攻击”，还有各种各样的物理攻击，是对抗时不可小觑的强大力量。当生命值低于1000时，收割者会变得更强。 击败收割者后，它的材料可用于制作一些高品质的虚空盔甲和武器。“漆黑收割者”可以通过在“流明祭坛”上使用“远古之心”再次与之战斗。

p.k: The Snowfallen is a large beast which roams a far off land and migrates when the temperature begins to decline. These creatures are thought to form large groups in an unknown nesting grounds but nobody has been able to find this place. The snowfallen has 2 main abilities, a ground slam that creates an ice crystal that inflicts frostbite on impact and a leap that will also create ice crystals at the impact point. Its materials are used for a variety of mage gear.
p.v: “雪落者”是一种体型庞大的野兽，栖息在遥远的土地之上。当气温开始下降时，它们就会迁徙。人们认为这些生物会在一个未知的巢穴地聚集形成庞大的群体，但至今无人能够找到这个地方。雪落者有两种主要能力：一是“地面猛击”，通过猛击地面产生冰晶，被其击中时会使人遭受冻伤；二是“跳跃攻击”，在跳跃落地的撞击点同样会产生冰晶。雪落者的材料可用于制作各种法师装备。

p.k: Once the lost has been defeated more tainted creatures will be alerted to the players presence. The overseer and tainted distant ones will begin to spawn.
p.v: 一旦“迷失者”被击败，就会有更多被污染的生物察觉到玩家的存在。“监督者”和被污染的远方生物将开始出现。

p.k: The distortion is a brand new dimension which is accessed by mining around bedrock until you find broken bedrock, attempting to mine this block takes the player to a brand new dimension with new minibosses mobs ores and biomes. This is also the home world of daraku so expect him to be a threat. It is highly recommended to come here with enchanted armor around diamond tier.
p.v: 虚空世界是一个全新的维度。你需要在基岩周围进行挖掘，直至找到破碎的基岩。尝试挖掘这块基岩后，玩家就会被传送到一个全新的维度。在这个维度里，有新的boss、怪物、矿石以及生物群系。这里也是达拉库的故乡，所以要小心他带来的威胁。强烈建议玩家身着钻石级别的附魔盔甲再来此地。

p.k: The omen can be cured by finding all four photo peices and assembling them into a framed photo. After this get the omen to chase you and right click on him to give him the photo and trigger a cutscene. After this you will need to kill daraku he will drop a new item that can be used to make the sigil of purification which is used to cure the omen.
p.v: 可以通过找到全部四张照片碎片并将它们拼成一幅拼装好的照片来净化“预兆”。完成这一步后，设法让“预兆”来追你，然后右键点击它，将照片交给它，从而触发一段过场动画。在此之后，你需要击败达拉库。击败他后，他会掉落一个新物品，利用这个物品可以制作“净化徽章”，而“净化徽章”可用于净化“预兆”。

p.k: The omen can be traded with using ominous berry treats if its in passive mode or at an offering altar. This is required to get one of the photo peices but also gives some valuable items in exchange.
p.v: 如果“预兆”处于被动模式或者是在交易祭坛处，就可以用“不祥浆果点心”与它进行交易。这是获取其中一张照片碎片的必要方式，而且通过交易还能换来一些有价值的物品。

p.k: The inscription table is used to research mob drops and unlock beastiary entries. Simply put a mob drop into the table, research it and the entry will be unlocked.
p.v: 铭刻台用于研究怪物掉落的物品并解锁图鉴条目。只需将怪物的掉落物放入铭刻台中，对其进行研究，相应的图鉴条目就会解锁。

p.k: Followers are members of a cult with the omen as their god. The followers have built many structures around the world such as camps, towers, villages and underground fortresses. These structures often contain some unique and valuable loot but the followers inside can be quite difficult to deal with.
p.v: 追随者们是一个以“预兆”为信仰之神的邪教成员。他们在世界各地建造了许多建筑，比如营地、塔楼、村庄以及地下堡垒。这些建筑中往往藏有一些独特且有价值的战利品，但里面的追随者可能会相当难对付。

p.k: After the omen is brought to his senses daraku and his forces will have free reign over the overworld, daraku himself will become stronger and new monsters will begin spawning in the distortion until the player cures the omen and accepts his quest to get rid of daraku. To do this you need to craft the chains of nullification and right click them on daraku to take his power away. after this darakus forces will not be able to access the overworld but the new monsters spawning in the distortion will continue spawning.
p.v: 在“预兆”恢复理智后，达拉库及其势力将在主世界肆意横行。达拉库自身会变得更强大，新的怪物也会开始在虚空世界中生成，直至玩家净化“预兆”并接受驱赶达拉库的任务。要完成这个任务，你需要制作“虚无之链”，然后右键点击达拉库，以此剥夺他的力量。在此之后，达拉库的势力将无法再进入主世界，但在虚空世界中不断生成的新怪物仍会继续出现。

p.k: Once daraku has been unpowered he wont do much. Usually wandering around dark areas and vanishes after a while. But if the player gifts daraku a radiite charm when they find him they are able to partially befriend him allowing the player to keep him as an npc.
p.v: 一旦达拉库的力量被剥夺，他就没什么大的作为了。通常会在阴暗区域四处游荡，过一会儿便消失不见。但如果玩家在找到达拉库时送给他一枚拉迪石护身符，就能与他部分建立友好关系，从而使玩家可以将他当作一个非玩家角色（NPC）留存下来。

p.k: When pursuit triggers you are hit with a jumpscare and music starts. When this happens its important to stay calm, a mistake many make it running as fast as they can but the omen mimicks your speed and this is only digging your own grave. To escape him you need to crouch up and down to keep him slow and avoid jumping as this will give him a speed boost.
p.v: 当追击触发时，你会遭遇惊吓跳脸效果，同时音乐响起。此时保持冷静非常重要，很多人会犯的错误是拼命奔跑，但“预兆”会模仿你的速度，这样做无异于自掘坟墓。要逃脱它的追击，你需要上下蹲动来拖慢它的速度，并且避免跳跃，因为跳跃会使它加速。

p.k: The sigil of warding is an item crafted with unstable power, iresteel and irestone. When in your offhand it will protect you from one omen chase encounter.
p.v: 守护符文是一种利用不稳定的能量、怒火铁和怒火石制作而成的物品。当它被装备在副手时，能让你在面对一次“预兆”的追击时受到保护。

p.k: The resting grounds are accessed through tiso after beating glykaris for the first time. To exit the dimension you will need to find a shrine and right click it.
p.v: 安息之地在首次击败格莱卡瑞斯后，可通过提索的传送进入。若要离开这个维度，你需要找到一座神殿并右键点击它。

p.k: To access the abyss you will need to progress darakus sidequest after befriending him until he gives you a voidbreaker. Once you have the voidbreaker right click bedrock in the distortion in order to create an entrance into the abyss, trying to mine this block will send you there. The reaper only wakes up if its night in the overworld and to exit you will need to find a shrine to escape
p.v: 要进入深渊，你需要在和达拉库成为好友后推进他的支线任务，直到他给你一把“虚空破坏者”。一旦拿到“虚空破坏者”，在虚空中对基岩右键点击，就能创建一个通往深渊的入口，尝试挖掘这个方块会将你传送到那里。“收割者”只有在主世界是夜晚时才会苏醒。若要离开深渊，你需要找到一座神殿来逃脱。

p.k: Mana is a new bar that only appears if the player is holding a magic weapon. The players starts with 200 max mana and 1 mana regen, this can be boosted with special armor. If the player abuses the weapon and stays at 0 mana bubbles for an extended period of time they may begin to take damage. Some magic weapons require mana over 200 to fire which requires the player to use custom armor.
p.v: 法力值是一条新的能量条，仅当玩家手持魔法武器时才会显示。玩家初始的最大法力值为200点，法力值（应该是每tick）回复1点，这一数值可以通过特殊盔甲来提升。如果玩家过度使用魔法武器，且长时间使法力值处于0点状态（即法力值气泡全部耗尽），那么玩家可能会开始受到伤害。有些魔法武器在发射时需要超过200点的法力值，这就要求玩家使用定制的盔甲。

p.k: Huntedd allows the omen to track the player from anywhere. Seiged is the rare second stage to hunted which causes all hostile mobs in the area to swarm the player.
p.v: “被追猎”使“预兆”能够从任何地方追踪玩家。“被围攻”是“被追猎”极为罕见的第二阶段，在此阶段，该区域内的所有敌对怪物都会向玩家发起围攻。
